TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RequiredRuntimeAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class RequiredRuntimeAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class RequiredRuntimeAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当使用 RequiredRuntimeAttribute 进行标记时，任务指示它具有比常规任务更严格的运行时要求-这会告诉 MSBuild，如果当前运行时与版本要求不匹配，则它将需要为该任务启动一个单独的进程。

span.span: When marked with the RequiredRuntimeAttribute, a task indicates that it has stricter runtime requirements than a regular task - this tells MSBuild that it will need to potentially launch a separate process for that task if the current runtime does not match the version requirement.

summary.span: 此属性当前不起作用，因为只有一个版本的 CLR 可以运行 MSBuild v2.0 或 v 3.5-运行时 v2。0

span.span: This attribute is currently non-functional since there is only one version of the CLR that is capable of running MSBuild v2.0 or v3.5 - the runtime v2.0

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标记为的任务 指示它具有比常规任务更严格的运行时要求。A task marked with the indicates that it has a stricter runtime requirement than a regular task. 如果当前 CLR 运行时版本与所需的版本不匹配，则它会提醒 MSBuild 可能需要为任务启动单独的进程。It alerts MSBuild that it may need to start a separate process for the task if the current CLR runtime version does not match the required version. > [!NOTE] > 此属性当前不起作用，因为只有一个版本的 CLR (2.0) 可以运行 MSBuild 版本2.0 或3.5。This attribute is currently non-functional because only one version of the CLR (2.0) is capable of running either MSBuild version 2.0 or 3.5. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅 [使用属性扩展元数据](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about using attributes, see [Extending Metadata Using Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/).

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

param.name: runtimeVersion
param.span: 所需的 CLR 运行时的版本，以“v”开头，例如“v2.0”。

span.span: The version of the CLR runtime required prefaced with a "v," such as "v2.0."

summary.span: 采用版本的构造函数，如 "v2.0"。

span.span: Constructor taking a version, such as "v2.0".

public: property System::String ^ RuntimeVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 返回用构造的属性的运行时版本，如 "v2.0"

span.span: Returns the runtime version the attribute was constructed with, e.g., "v2.0"

value.span: 一个字符串，包含所需的 CLR 运行时版本。

span.span: A string containing the CLR runtime version required.
